test.input: Katniss Everdeen is a person who likes cats.
test.output: ClassAssertion(ObjectIntersectionOf(Class(Person person) ObjectSomeValuesFrom(ObjectProperty(like likes) Class(Cat cats))) Individual(KatnissEverdeen Katniss Everdeen))

test.input: Katniss is a person who likes cats.
test.output: ClassAssertion(ObjectIntersectionOf(Class(Person person) ObjectSomeValuesFrom(ObjectProperty(like likes) Class(Cat cats))) Individual(Katniss Katniss))

test.input: Lily Potter and Petunia Dursley are persons.
Lily Potter is a wizard, but Petunia Dursley is a muggle.
